title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: When a working set is removed, changes are immediately applied without any confirmation or warning.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
EB: After removing the working set, the package view should no longer be filtered and show the complete set of packages.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project in the workspace. 
2. Select the working set to apply the filter on the package view.
3. Remove the working set either through the UI or by using the corresponding action/command.
4. Observe that the package view is no longer filtered and displays all packages.
